summary: Law firm application with Google Forms integration for contact form submissions instead of custom form implementation
architectural_notes: Using Google Form embed URL: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScwbjL6QpOP03v9AOZ4RXBWrsCjvRLgrdj86UHzAvUQZKyfUA/viewform?embedded=true for contact form integration
SEO implementation will include JSON-LD structured data for legal services and local business information
Meta tags and Open Graph tags will be added to all pages for better social sharing and search engine indexing

existing_features.title: Create a leads page accessible only to authenticated admin users that displays all contact form submissions with filtering by jurisdiction and status
Create an admin initialization page where the first user can set themselves as admin by connecting their Internet Identity
Implement contact form on frontend that submits to backend with validation for name, phone, email, jurisdiction, practice area, and message fields
Create home page featuring hero section, practice area cards for Family Law, Corporate Law, Criminal Defense, Civil Law, and Property Law with descriptions
Implement navigation header with The Jurists branding, main navigation links, jurisdiction dropdown, and Internet Identity authentication controls
Create jurisdiction-specific pages for Hyderabad, Secunderabad, Rangareddy, and Cyberabad highlighting local legal services with embedded contact forms

Debug and fix the leads page routing issue where the /leads page intermittently becomes inaccessible after initially loading, ensuring the route remains consistently available in the TanStack Router configuration
Verify and ensure the LeadsPage component is properly registered in the router configuration with correct lazy loading and authentication guards
Add error boundary handling to the leads page route to catch and display any runtime errors that might cause the page to unmount unexpectedly
Investigate and fix any React Query cache invalidation or state management issues that might cause the leads page to unmount or become unavailable after initial render

Replace the ContactForm component implementation with an embedded Google Forms iframe that includes fields for name, phone, email, jurisdiction (dropdown with options: Hyderabad, Secunderabad, Rangareddy, Cyberabad), practice area (dropdown with options: Family Law, Corporate Law, Criminal Defense, Civil Law, Property Law), and message
Update the ContactPage to display the Google Forms embedded form with appropriate styling and layout that matches the luxury legal theme
Update all jurisdiction-specific pages (Hyderabad, Secunderabad, Rangareddy, Cyberabad) to use the Google Forms embedded contact form instead of the custom form
Update ServiceDetailPage to use the Google Forms embedded contact form instead of the custom ContactForm component

Replace the placeholder Google Forms URL in the ContactForm component with the user-provided embed URL: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScwbjL6QpOP03v9AOZ4RXBWrsCjvRLgrdj86UHzAvUQZKyfUA/viewform?embedded=true
Update the iframe dimensions in the ContactForm component to match the user-provided specifications: width="640" height="978"

Add SEO meta tags to all pages including descriptive title tags (50-60 characters), meta descriptions (150-160 characters), and Open Graph tags (og:title, og:description, og:image, og:url) for social sharing optimization

Implement JSON-LD structured data (schema.org) on all pages including LocalBusiness schema with name, address, telephone, geo coordinates, and opening hours, plus LegalService schema for each practice area with service type, area served, and provider details
Add proper semantic HTML heading hierarchy (single H1 per page, logical H2-H6 structure) across all pages ensuring each page has exactly one H1 containing primary keywords
Add descriptive alt text to all images across the site including practice area icons, jurisdiction images, and any decorative images, using relevant keywords naturally

Optimize all page URLs to be descriptive and keyword-rich, ensuring jurisdiction pages use format /jurisdiction/[location] and service pages use /services/[practice-area] with hyphens separating words

Create a blog/articles section accessible at /blog with at least 5 initial articles covering common legal questions in practice areas (family law, corporate law, criminal defense, civil law, property law) and jurisdiction-specific legal information for Hyderabad, Secunderabad, Rangareddy, and Cyberabad
Add canonical URLs to all pages to prevent duplicate content issues, pointing to the preferred version of each page
Implement breadcrumb navigation with structured data (BreadcrumbList schema) on all non-homepage pages to improve navigation and provide additional structured data for search engines
Add FAQ sections with FAQ schema markup to each practice area detail page answering common legal questions relevant to that practice area

Optimize the Contact page and jurisdiction pages to include complete NAP (Name, Address, Phone) information in both visible text and schema markup, plus embed a Google Map iframe showing office location

Create a sitemap.xml file at frontend/public/sitemap.xml containing all public pages including home (/), about (/about), services (/services), service detail pages (/services/family-law, /services/corporate-law, /services/criminal-defense, /services/civil-law, /services/property-law, /services/real-estate-law, /services/intellectual-property, /services/employment-law, /services/litigation), blog list (/blog), blog detail pages (using article IDs from backend), contact (/contact), jurisdiction pages (/jurisdiction/hyderabad, /jurisdiction/secunderabad, /jurisdiction/rangareddy, /jurisdiction/cyberabad), with proper XML formatting, lastmod dates, changefreq values, and priority values according to page importance

Create a robots.txt file at frontend/public/robots.txt that allows all search engine crawlers (User-agent: *), permits crawling of all content (Allow: /), includes a reference to the sitemap location (Sitemap: https://[domain]/sitemap.xml), and optionally includes crawl-delay directive if needed for rate limiting

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a complete law firm application from scratch with backend contact form submission storage including fields for name, phone, email, jurisdiction, practice area, message, timestamp, and status tracking
Implement admin access control system with initialization capability where the first user to initialize becomes the admin

Implement comprehensive SEO optimization including meta tags, Open Graph tags, structured data (schema markup for LocalBusiness and LegalService), optimized page titles and descriptions, and heading hierarchy across all pages
Add blog/articles section with legal content covering practice areas and jurisdiction-specific legal information to improve content freshness and keyword targeting
Implement sitemap.xml generation and robots.txt configuration for improved search engine crawling
